title: A feasibility of office interruptibility estimation based on ceiling camera images and sounds.
abstract: Office workers are affected by surrounding environment including conversations and visitors. Interrupting a particular worker degrades not only his working efficiency but also the efficiency of others. Therefore, the estimation of interruptibility of entire office is required to attain appropriate interruptions. In this study, a feasibility of automatic estimation of office interruptibility based on the camera image and sound is discussed.
